content: Military and other security related personnel in the USA – disregarding level of clearance – are reported to have been influenced by brainwashing. It maintains a thought, emotion or attitude in the brain. Eg. the right rear zone of the brain might contain a stored thought like “I obey to [name]" or even "I'm not brainwashed". How to free oneself of this influence: it consists of sustaining the opposite thought at the same location of the brain, without using any words. Eg. instead of “I obey to [name]" think "I don't obey to [name]". Thought can be electromagnetically instaured in bodies. Here the same technique applies. If the method above should not result in the disappearance of thoughts, projecting might help: i.e. the intent to vanish the internalized thought.

content: It goes without saying that other sovereign states in the world will not be free from this mind influence technique.

content: Wash only in warm water. Gentle cycle only. No bleach or fabric softener. Remove immediately after spin cycle. Reinstall brain.
